files.description: Standalone Python generator that creates /outputs/customer_discovery_guide.md, /outputs/wtp_pricing_sheet.xlsx (or .csv fallback), and /outputs/interview_tracker.csv with the required fields and sensible default templates.

missionDescription: Create customer discovery and pricing validation deliverables in /outputs: /outputs/customer_discovery_guide.md (interview script + hypotheses), /outputs/wtp_pricing_sheet.xlsx (or csv), and /outputs/interview_tracker.csv with fields for segment, use case, decision criteria, budget, objections, and regulatory concerns.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
Missing direction identified: customer discovery + willingness-to-pay; without this, market sizing and product packaging remain speculative.
